text: NGC 449 is a spiral galaxy of type (R')S? located in the constellation Pisces. It was discovered on November 11, 1881 by Édouard Stephan. It was described by Dreyer as "very faint, very small, round, very little brighter middle, very faint star involved." ==References== ==External links== * 0449 18811111 Category:Pisces (constellation) Category:Spiral galaxies 4587
title: NGC 449
